title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri (2017)
explanation: This movie plot explores reality through a satirical lens, as it presents a dark and humorous depiction of a small town's reaction to a mother's quest for justice. The theme of surveillance is also present, as the billboards serve as a public critique of the police force's failure to solve a heinous crime. The plot delves into the complexities of human nature, including racism, violence, and grief, while also offering moments of redemption and hope.
